name: Lady Liana
message: Hello! thank you for accepting to come here

name: Traveler
message: It's not like I have a choice

name: Lady Liana
message: Well I hope Sir Dorian wasnt rude with you, I need your help for an important task

name: Traveler
message: What kind of task?

name: Lady Liana
message: I always have considered that all the citizens in Valdir should live with equal conditions

name: Lady Liana
message: However although I think like that, great part of the nobility dont think the same

name: Traveler
message: And what do I have to do with all of this? Im just a simple traveler

name: Lady Liana
message: Well, Im not allowed to go to the workers district or the slums, but you can

name: Lady Liana
message: So I need you to speak on my behalf with the citizens

name: Traveler
message: And what should I tell them?

name: Lady Liana
message: Ask them for their problems in the city, the things that they need...

name: Lady Liana
message: And tell them that Im going to make an audience with the king

name: Traveler
message: Wow so maybe there is a solution to all of this poverty and inequality

name: Lady Liana
message: I hope so, but I need to know what the people think

name: Traveler
message: Ok, I will do it

name: Lady Liana
message: Thank you so much, I will wait for your return

name: Traveler
message: I will be back soon

name: Lady Liana
message: Have you done what I asked?

name: Traveler
message: Not yet, but I will my lady

name: Lady Liana
message: Thank you, I will be waiting for you here
